body.name: Drizzte Plus Size 47-83inch Men's Black Nylon Military Tactical Plastic Buckle Belt
features: Fabric type Nylon belt and checkpoint friendly plastic buckle

Feature: Non-metal design, breathable and lightweight, perfect for metal or nickel allergic people. Don't need to remove it when going through the security check. Suitable for people who need to pass metal detectors every day. Also, it is an ideal belt for air travel.
Belt: Quality nylon material, lightweight and comfortable, not fade, not twist, always keep a good shape.

Buckle: Normal low density plastic will break easily, so we used a quality YKK POM buckle. POM is an engineering thermoplastic used in precision parts requiring high stiffness. You can clearly see the YKK on the inside of the buckle, this plastic is very strong and durable. Buckle back small clamp can be unlatched, so you can trim the belt length after losing weight. Full adjustable can set the belt wherever fit you best.

The occasion for: Classic simple black belt, fit for any occasion. Work, business meeting, travel, sport, looks gentleman and formal on suit pants, looks casual and stylish on chino pants, looks fashion on jeans. One belt for all your daily occasions. Can be used as a gift to a husband, father, boyfriend, and friends, and is a very utility and intimate gift.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #121,179 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #522 in Men's Belts

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Drizzte Plus Size Long Men's Military Duty Web Nylon Belt Polyoxymethylene (POM) Buckle Black 100% polyamide nylon belt, YKK POM plastic buckle.Metal-free design, environmental, lightweight, Security Checkpoint Friendly.Belt lightweight. point tail easy to go through the pants loops. easy on and off.Buckle made of POM plastic which can bear the strength like metal. It is an engineering thermoplastic used in precision parts requiring high stiffness, low friction, and excellent dimensional stability.Classic black color, fit most of your daily wearing, work, sport, hunting, travel, etc.Non-holes design, fully adjustable, allows the buckle to lock in any position for a perfect fit. The ending clamp can open, and you can cut the excess if you feel long. After cutting, gently heat up the cut port with a lighter fire, the port will solidify and will not loosen. Then reinstall the belt to the buckle.The belt size needs to choose longer than the waist size.

Metal Free The whole belt does not have any metal, nickel free, anti-metal allergy. Can safely pass through any metal detector in airports and workplaces without taking off the belt. Fully Adjustable The design without holes allows you to get rid of the trouble of finding holes, and you don't have to worry about the holes being cracked. Simply tighten it into place to fasten the buckle for a perfect fit. Real Nylon Fabric High density nylon fabric, very light, no breakage, no peeling. Fit for any occasion. Work, business meeting, travel, sport, looks gentleman and formal on suit pants, looks casual and stylish on chino pants, looks fashion on jeans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best belt for weight loss!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve dropped 100lbs this year and only needed 1 belt! Bought a second because my fiancé kept stealing it. Easy to use, strong, long, and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most durable, best fitting
reviews.reviewText: This is the best belt I've ever owned. The first one I bought over 10 years ago still looks great and works like new. I bought a second one just so I wouldn't have to move the first one between pants. These belts don't wear out like old leather and buckle belts do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The belt looks and works great. The belt is made very well and in good quality condition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent belt, buckle feels weak
reviews.reviewText: It's a nice belt, plenty long to fit my fat gut, and the belt itself it a good material, but the buckle feels pretty weak, it feels like it'll break after using it for a while, but that's just a feeling, it's working well at the moment and keeps the belt in place, just worried it'll break. They even give a backup buckle which is nice and I appreciate it, but it just makes my fear worse knowing they probably know they break so they give backups.My fear aside. good belt, looks good when worn. 4/5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great belt, but don’t listen to the reviews
reviews.reviewText: People were saying this runs small, so I went up a size. It was ridiculously large—about a foot longer than the keeper. If anything, these belts run large. I’m exchanging for a size smaller. Would go down 2 sizes, but 47’ is the smallest.Otherwise, seems high quality. Belt itself is a military grade type nylon. Very thick and rugged. Plastic buckle seems solid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Give'm a Belt.
reviews.reviewText: Good, constructed belt. Reasonably priced. Easy to assemble and adjust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The buckle seem to be very strong. Time will tell.
reviews.reviewText: I have several micro-adjustable type belts. All the others all have metal buckles. I'm interested to see how this one holds up over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I liked it at first
reviews.reviewText: It fits fine and it gets me through tsa without tripping the metal detector. However, I wore it on vacation and the edges picked a hole in the brand new rash guard I brought. Also, it's slightly too wide so it digs into my stomach a bit, no other belts do. Overall, it's OK. But the ruined shirt made me really unhappy with it.
Great product, made well and looks great.

reviews.reviewTitle: Stays in place, order larger than your normal belt size.
reviews.reviewText: Arrived a full day ahead of expected arrival, looks to be a good belt and fits well, wearing it at work where I have to wear heavyish work pants all day and spend most of my time walking around carrying heavy items I have been losing weight fast enough that I have had to add holes to my leather belt four times and continually had to adjust my pants, with this belt I just have to cinch it up and close the buckle and it's done, and unlike the typical metal friction rod web belts that I've used before it seems to stay in place very well, not needing to be tightened a lot.I will say that they DO run shorter than you might expect, I would've normally taken a 50" belt, I ordered a 59" after reading other reviews, and I think ordering a larger size is well advised.Makes an excellent pairing with Dickies 874 Work Pants as it is thin enough to go through the extremely tight belt loops twice.

This belt replaced a similar one I had for a long time. This one so far has held up well, only been a few weeks, so we will see. The belt and buckle stay attached, which is an improvement over my old one, where I would have to reconnect it all the time. I am not crazy about the brand name printed on the front though. While it did arrive ahead of the scheduled due date, took too long in my opinion, but came from China, I believe. It is not going to win any fashion awards, but for yard work, house repairs, general day to day, it is up to the task.

bought this for my husband who is a big guy. he was having problems finding a belt that would fit him and that would not dig into his belly. after getting this he only wears this belt now. he says any guy with a bigger belly should get this and the price point is great.

reviews.reviewTitle: An easy to use, well priced product
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to use. Fit exactly the way it was sent. The guide for fitting was perfect. And it looks good. If you’re looking for a belt that’s way more comfortable and less of a pain in the traditional belt, this works
